title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2399/86 of 30 July 1986 amending Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2347/84 on dried grapes eligible for production aid
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2399/86
of 30 July 1986
amending Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2347/84 on dried grapes eligible for production aid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2347/84, part I 'Coefficient applicable to the minimum price', the table headed 'currants' is replaced by the table in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 July 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 49, 27. 2. 1986, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 159, 14. 6. 1986, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 219, 16. 8. 1984, p. 1.
ANNEX
'CURRANTS
